Research #

Possible solutions that fit our needs can be categorized into three groups. Each get a grade from 1 (best) to 5 (worst):

CTF Frameworks #

picoCTFEasyCTFCTFdechoCTFFbctfNightShade

Quiz Library #

jQuizzy

While doing research, I concluded, that Quiz Library wouldn't be a good fit for this project. They don't feel that substantial and go in other directions in terms of the overall goal of the application.

Result #

The basis for this project is formed by CTFd. It convinces with good customizable and an already big set of features that match our previously defined must-haves and should-haves.
